Class Patient

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs401.group3.pillpopper.data.User
      • cs401.group3.pillpopper.data.Patient

  • public class Patient
extends User
    Since:
    March 2020, SDK 13
    Version:
    1.0 Purpose: A subclass of User for Patient objects. Used for storing data for patient accounts.
    Author:
    Lauren Dennedy, Yucheng Zheng, John Gilcreast, John Berge
